name: nitrofit28
description: NitroFIT28 is an easy-to-use gym management and administration system.
author: DepokSarkar <dipak@coderstm.com>

scripts.commit: clear && git config core.ignorecase false && branch="$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD)" || "dev" && branch=${branch##refs/heads/} && branch=${branch:-HEAD} && echo Commiting to Branch "$branch" && echo Please type your commit message && read msg && clear && git add . && git commit -m "$msg"
scripts.push:git: clear && git config core.ignorecase false && branch="$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD)" || "dev" && branch=${branch##refs/heads/} && branch=${branch:-HEAD} && echo Pushing to Branch "$branch" && echo Please type your commit message && read msg && clear && git add . && git commit -m "$msg" && git push origin "$branch"
scripts.push:prod: clear && echo Starting Production Push && yarn build:prod && yarn sync:prod && echo Finished Production Push
scripts.push:alpha: clear && echo Starting Alpha Push && yarn build:alpha && yarn sync:alpha && echo Finished Alpha Push
scripts.build:prod: cross-env BUILD_MODE=prod quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn build
scripts.build:alpha: cross-env BUILD_MODE=alpha quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn dev
scripts.build:dev: quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn dev
scripts.build:android: yarn make:app-icons -m capacitor && cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-${npm_config_env:-prod} quasar build --mode capacitor --target android --ide
scripts.build:ios: yarn make:app-icons -m capacitor && cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-${npm_config_env:-prod} quasar build --mode capacitor --target ios --ide
scripts.start:android: cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-${npm_config_env:-dev} quasar dev -m capacitor -T android
scripts.start:ios: cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-${npm_config_env:-dev} quasar dev -m capacitor -T ios
scripts.sync:prod: echo Starting Production File Sync && rsync -avz --delete --exclude-from=".syncignore" -e "ssh -p 22 " * $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server:$npm_package_config_ssh_folders_prod && ssh $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server "cd $npm_package_config_ssh_folders_prod && /usr/bin/php8.2 -f /usr/bin/composer install && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan optimize:clear && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan migrate --force && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan storage:link --force" && echo Finished Production File Sync
scripts.sync:alpha: echo Starting Alpha File Sync && rsync -avz --delete --exclude-from=".syncignore" -e "ssh -p 22 " * $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server:$npm_package_config_ssh_folders_alpha && ssh $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server "cd $npm_package_config_ssh_folders_alpha && /usr/bin/php8.2 -f /usr/bin/composer install && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan optimize:clear && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan migrate --force && /usr/bin/php8.2 artisan storage:link --force" && echo Finished Alpha File Sync
scripts.build:clean: echo Cleaning old build && del-cli public/assets public/pdfjs public/mix-manifest.json
